name: Beyond Astra
description:
Beyond Astra sees you exploring various parts of an advanced research facility, seemingly abandoned of any inhabitants, save for the few roaming machines dotted around.

This journey will test your platforming and puzzle solving skills, presenting you with numerous challenges that must be overcome. Some of these are simple, whereas others may require you to think outside the box.

Features Include:

-6 unique levels

-Multiple puzzles

-Engaging challenges

-Varied gameplay mechanics

-Sci-fi aesthetic

-And more!

Expected Playtime: Approximately 15 minutes.

NOTE: This project was created a couple years ago, but I'm still open to any and all feedback. Nevertheless, I hope you enjoy the game!
